channel.title: Linux VPS
channel.description:
Hello people,
I just got a CentOS Linux VPS. I am wondering how to convert the Run.bat, here is the code :
@echo off title InsidiaX "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
Please help me convert it. :)

item.title: Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @runeclub20 runeclub20
item.description:
@runeclub20 wrote:

It was offline then. I’m not sure what to put in run.sh. Also, do I do anything in the Console?

Read full topic

item.title: Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

okay now try doing “killall java” if it says no process killed your RSPS was never online but if it says nothing at all that means it was online

Read full topic

item.title: Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @runeclub20 runeclub20
item.description:
@runeclub20 wrote:

Right, I figured out the first bit.
It converts to a SH File, the code is :

java -classpath bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar server.Server

This is the error I get from doing ./run.sh :

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ClassFormatError: server.Server (unrecognized class file version)
at java.lang.VMClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.10)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.10)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.10)
at gnu.java.lang.MainThread.run(libgcj.so.10)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

A little Google goes a long way.

http://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/15inout/linux-cmd.html

item.title: Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @I_Grant_I I Grant I
item.description:
@I_Grant_I wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:2, topic:449362”][quote author=runeclub20 link=topic=552258.msg4045705#msg4045705 date=1342090171]
Hello people,

I just got a CentOS Linux VPS. I am wondering how to convert the Run.bat, here is the code :

@echo off
title InsidiaX
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Please help me convert it.
[/quote]

Tell me, why did you bought a VPS before learning how to use it?
Or why didn’t you bought a Windows VPS for 5 more bucks…

[size=6pt]I see everyone is trying to run a rsps nowadayyys. VPS’s making some good money :D[/size][/quote]

Linux runs better. EX: No lagg Also I need help aswell.

Read full topic
